DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study evaluate computer-based intervention title `` Trauma-informed Personalized Scripts '' ( TIPS ) . The goal intervention improve patient-provider communication sensitive topic intimate partner violence ( IPV ) reproductive coercion ( RC ) . The main aim study pilot test TIPS family planning clinic use randomize study design compare basic version TIPS ( computer-based assessment provider script ) enhance TIPS contain tailored brief intervention patient along provider script . The investigator plan recruit 240 female patient age 16-29 study .
DOC.brief_title: Trauma-informed Personalized Scripts ( TIPS ) Relationship Abuse
